author: Adebola Akomolafe
description: A modern reactive framework for fluid, dynamic web apps.

scripts.build: bun build-core && bun build-ssg && bun build-utils
scripts.publish-core: cd packages/retend && bun run build && bun publish
scripts.publish-ssg: cd packages/retend-server && bun run build && bun publish
scripts.publish-utils: cd packages/retend-utils && bun run build && bun publish
scripts.publish-all: bun run publish-core && bun run publish-ssg && bun run publish-start && bun run publish-utils
scripts.previews: cp README.md packages/retend/README.md && bunx pkg-pr-new publish './packages/retend' './packages/retend-server' './packages/retend-start' './packages/retend-utils'
